title: Hide Parke a comedie, as it vvas presented by her Majesties Servants, at the private house in Drury Lane. Written by Iames Shirly.
author: Shirley, James, 1596-1666.
publisher: Printed by Tho. Cotes, for Andrew Crooke, and William Cooke,
notes: Reproduction of the original in the Folger Shakespeare Library.
